Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' events that are eventually followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' appears, and their total frequency
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that are part of re-submission cycles (i.e., preceded by any 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to total number of pre-approver-related activities (i.e., sum of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' events with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all pre-approver decisions (approvals + rejections) that result in approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs after a rejection by any role (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', or 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that occur in variants containing at least one rejection step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that lead directly to successful payment (i.e., followed by 'Request Payment' and then 'Payment Handled' without further rejections)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' per year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in variants that do not include 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all approval activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', and 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER']"}"
